item.title: English-Spanish Bioinformatics Dictionary
item.description: Here is an English-Spanish bioinformatics dictionary.

item.title: Gene transfer mechanisms in bacteria
item.description: Bacterial gene transfer differs from eukaryotes. Bacteria can transfer their genes both vertically and horizontally.

item.title: Some links for bioinformatics newbies
item.description: When we dive into a field, we don’t know where to start. I hope these links will be helpful for bioinformatics newbies.
